itemDisplayName: Azure Logic Apps - AS2 Send Receive
description: Creates Integration Accounts for two partners (Contoso and Fabrikam) and adds Partners and Agreements into them. It creates Logic Apps between Fabrikam Sales and Contoso which demonstrate synchronous AS2 Send Receive. It also creates Logic Apps between Fabrikam Finance and Contoso which demonstrate asynchronous AS2 Send Receive.
summary: Demonstrates AS2 Send Receive using Logic Apps
